title: Can Love Be Blind in The Tinder Economy - How Much Does Physicality Matter?
itunes:title: Can Love Be Blind in The Tinder Economy - How Much Does Physicality Matter?
itunes:subtitle: Dating in the modern world has become a nightmare...are we even built for this shit?
description:
The Basic and the Brain go from chit chatting about DNI 365 (the sequel), Netflix's budget cuts, and love of reality TV trash to discussing online dating in the age of the Tinder Economy. This week we're deep diving into how much physical attractiveness matters in our modern dating world from the perspective of the "Tinder Economy", provide an overview on the studies of physical markers for compatibility (hello saliva and pheromones!), dating horror stories plus much more.


Join us this week as we try to figure out if we're socially screwed or if we can problem solve for modern dating woes!


Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
